title: Pixel 3 stopped receiving SMS unless rebooted
content:
My Pixel 3xl has stopped receiving SMS messages unless the device is rebooted. once rebooted I will get the missed SMS messages but after about 10 minutes the device will stop receiving messages again. 

I have factory reset the device 4 times, 2 times restoring to a backup and 2 times without restoring to a backup, however the issue persists. 

I have rebooted into safe mode and the issue appears to stop. but as soon as I reboot out of safe-mode the issue resurfaces .

Is there a more thorough factory reset I could do to ensure the phone is scraped clean or or does anyone have any other suggestions? 

thanks!
